mapper.update:
update vman_user
usid = #{usid},
user_phone = #{userPhone},
user_email = #{userEmail},
user_psd = #{userPsd},
user_name = #{userName},
user_sex = #{userSex},
user_age = #{userAge},
user_birth = #{userBirth},
user_address = #{userAddress},
user_hobby = #{userHobby},
member_code = #{memberCode},
member_type = #{memberType},
card_code = #{cardCode},
card_type = #{cardType},
create_time = #{createTime},
last_time = #{lastTime},
remarks = #{remarks},
where usid = #{usid}
